title: "Dallas-Based Apex Fintech Solutions Acquires AdvisorArch"
excerpt: "Apex Fintech Solutions Inc., a Dallas-based company, has acquired AdvisorArch, a portfolio management company and modern rebalancer for financial advisors. According to Apex, the acquisition will strengthen its RIA Custody & Execution Platform with a suite of digital advice tools that enable wealth management firms to build remarkable client experiences at scale."
